title: 106_hr3234
content:
The curr_chunk is: "SECTION 1. REPORTS WITHIN THE JURISDICTION OF THE COMMITTEE ON EDUCATION AND THE WORKFORCE."

The summarized text chunk is: "Reports within the jurisdiction of the Committee on Education and the Workforce." The summarized text chunk is: "Certain reports exempt from Federal Reports Elimination and Sunset Act of 1995 include those required by specific education-related laws." The curr_chunk discusses various sections of education-related laws that require specific reports, such as waivers, budget submissions, audits, compliance notices, student loan data, and reports of the Javits Fellows Program Fellowship Board. The curr_chunk outlines specific provisions from the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Act of 1965 and the Arts and Artifacts Indemnity Act related to the state of the arts and humanities in the nation, annual reports summarizing activities, and certification of claims validity. The curr_chunk details various annual reporting requirements from different acts, including the National Commission on Libraries and Information Science Act, the Education of the Deaf Act of 1986, and the United States Institute of Peace Act. The curr_chunk provides reporting requirements from various acts related to Indian education programs, including reviews of school closures, compliance with health and safety standards, and annual reports on educational programs. The curr_chunk outlines reporting requirements from various acts related to Indian education programs, including evaluations of school operations, program results, and activities related to the Equal Opportunity Employment Commission. The curr_chunk lists reporting requirements from different acts related to the Equal Opportunity Employment Commission, including sections from the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, Civil Rights Act of 1964, and Rehabilitation Act of 1973. The curr_chunk outlines reporting requirements related to labor laws, including sections from the National Labor Relations Act, the Bureau of Labor Statistics, and the Fair Labor Standards Act. The curr_chunk discusses reporting requirements under various labor laws, including the Fair Labor Standards Act, Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Act, and Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970. The curr_chunk discusses reporting requirements under labor laws such as the Wagner-Peyser Act, Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act, and Labor Management Relations Act. The curr_chunk discusses reporting requirements under various labor laws, including the Occupational Safety and Health Act, Public Law 101-647, and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act. The curr_chunk outlines reporting requirements for various agencies under different laws, such as the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation, Department of Labor, and Equal Employment Opportunity Commission. The curr_chunk states that the bill was passed by the House of Representatives on November 10, 1999, with the attestation of JEFF TRANDAHL, Clerk.
